abstract: Some people stand by a window to get decent service for their iPhones. Others rearrange the furniture.
snippet: Some people stand by a window to get decent service for their iPhones. Others rearrange the furniture.
lead_paragraph: If you have an iPhone and live in New York City, San Francisco or Los Angeles, you probably know that AT&T’s network isn’t exactly reliable. As an AT&T and iPhone patron, I find that my ability to make calls and get online fades in and out on an almost hourly basis, even in my home.

headline.main: Creative Solutions to iPhone Service Woes
